      An action that is composed of several other actions.
      class  KeyAction
      An action which presses a given Key on the Keyboard.
      class  KeyDown
      An action which presses a given Key on the Keyboard.
      class  KeyUp
      An action which releases a given Key on the Keyboard.
      class  KillProcess
      An action that kills a process by PID or by Name.
      class  MouseDown
      An action which presses a given Button on the StandardMouse of an SUT.
      class  MouseGesture
      An action which moves the cursor of the StandardMouse of an SUT to a given position.
      class  MouseMove 
      class  MouseUp
      An action which releases a given Button on the StandardMouse of an SUT.
      class  NOP
      The 'No Operation' action.
      class  Type
      An action that types a given text on the StandardKeyboard of the SUT.
      class  Wait
      An action that simply waits a given amount of seconds.
